statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance > 4.5;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE communication_performance < 3.0;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard ORDER BY delivery_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.5;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance, communication_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance < 3.0 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE communication_performance BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY delivery_performance ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance, communication_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY delivery_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scorecard ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance < 3.0 ORDER BY quality_performance ASC;
SELECT * FROM kpi_tracking WHERE kpi_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, actual_value FROM kpi_tracking WHERE kpi_name LIKE '%performance%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 4.5
SELECT supplier_name, quality_performance, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance < 3
SELECT supplier_name, quality_performance, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard ORDER BY delivery_performance DESC
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, actual_value FROM kpi_tracking WHERE kpi_date >= '2022-01-01' AND kpi_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, actual_value FROM kpi_tracking WHERE actual_value / target_value < 0.9
SELECT * FROM supplier_scorecard;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM kpi_metrics ORDER BY kpi_actual DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE on_time_delivery = TRUE;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_target, kpi_actual, kpi_variance FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_variance < -0.1;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 0.8 AND quality_performance > 0.7
SELECT supplier_name, on_time_delivery FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE on_time_delivery = true
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_variance FROM kpi_metrics ORDER BY kpi_variance DESC
SELECT evaluation_date, overall_score FROM performance_evaluation WHERE evaluation_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT supplier_name, quality_performance FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_id = 5
SELECT * FROM supplier_scores;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scores WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, overall_performance FROM supplier_scores JOIN performance_evaluation ON supplier_scores.supplier_id = performance_evaluation.supplier_id;
SELECT k.kpi_name, s.score FROM kpis k JOIN supplier_kpi_scores s ON k.kpi_id = s.kpi_id WHERE s.supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scores WHERE delivery_performance > 4 AND quality_performance > 4;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_performance, quality_performance FROM supplier_scores
SELECT * FROM supplier_scores WHERE delivery_performance > 0.8
SELECT supplier_name, kpi_name, score FROM supplier_kpi_scores INNER JOIN kpis ON supplier_kpi_scores.kpi_id = kpis.kpi_id
SELECT s.supplier_name, p.evaluation_date, p.overall_performance FROM supplier_scores s INNER JOIN performance_evaluation p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT kpi_id, kpi_name, kpi_description FROM kpi_definition ORDER BY kpi_name DESC;
SELECT kpi_value FROM kpi_values WHERE kpi_date = '2022-01-01' AND kpi_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT category_name FROM kpi_categories WHERE category_name IN ('Category A', 'Category B');
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_description FROM kpi_definition WHERE kpi_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpi_values WHERE kpi_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT kpi_name, category_name FROM kpi_definition JOIN kpi_mapping ON kpi_definition.kpi_id = kpi_mapping.kpi_id JOIN kpi_categories ON kpi_mapping.category_id = kpi_categories.category_id;
